snippet: After forecasting a pretax loss of more than 450 million Australian dollars from its international unit, Qantas Airways has hired Macquarie to help the company defend itself against potential takeover bids.
abstract: After forecasting a pretax loss of more than 450 million Australian dollars from its international unit, Qantas Airways has hired Macquarie to help the company defend itself against potential takeover bids.

headline.main: Wary of a Takeover, Qantas Hires Macquarie
